{{Description|Dear Travelers~<br>The new event meticulously prepared by Paimon, "Adventurers, Assemble!", is about to begin!<br>Participate in the event for the opportunity to win [[Mora]], [[artifacts]], [[Primogem]]s and other rewards!<ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1319488722157580289 Official Announcement]</ref>}}
'''Adventurers, Assemble!''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 1.0]].

==Requirements==
* You can receive rewards by participating in the event, inviting other players or accepting another Traveler's invitation.
* You can accept an invitation to participate in the event only if your [[Adventure Rank]] is equal to or below 7. You can invite other players only if your Adventure Rank is equal to or above 15.
* Each Traveler can invite up to 10 other players. New Travelers can only accept a single invite.

==Event Rules==
# If your [[Adventure Rank]] is equal to or below 7, you can go to the "Link Friend" page to enter another Traveler's invitation code and create an Adventure Bond with them.
# If your Adventure Rank is equal to or above 15, you can go to the "Invite Friends" to obtain your own invitation code. When a New Adventurer enters your invitation code, you will be linked with an Adventure Bond. You can check the invitation status of each New Adventurer in "Invite History".
# After reaching Adventure Rank 15, each New Adventurer will also receive their own invitation code that can be used to invite other eligible Travelers.
# Each Traveler's invitation code can be used to invite up to 10 other players. Each Traveler can only accept a single invite.
# Event rewards will be distributed via in-game mail. The message will expire after 30 days, so don't forget to claim your rewards in time.
# The event is open to players on the America, Europe, Asia, and HK/MO/TW Servers on PS4, iOS, Android, and PC. PS4 players should participate from within the game.
# The Genshin Impact Official Community Team reserves the right of final interpretation of this event's rules.
